message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would be a great addition to your needs. Given its high value and quality, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you for $135. I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $120?
